main event: A star-like object was observed traveling across the sky, and two additional objects later joined it before disappearing after about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object initially appeared as a single point of light, but two additional objects later joined it.
The objects were observed for about 15 minutes before disappearing.
The report includes a sighting of a large, star-like object with flashing lights, estimated to be 100-150 feet in size.
The object was observed moving from the WNW to the NE direction.
The report also includes a separate sighting of two smaller objects that ascended and then disappeared after 30-45 minutes.
sighted object: Star-like object, two additional objects, and a large object with flashing lights
